reviewText: Dangerous Invitations Dvd Shauna O'Brien Beverly Lynne Unrated Uncut Reg 1 Ntsc Import Spanish Cover English Language This is an excellent movie, it is one of the few softcore films with established stars to show explicit female nudity. It's worth the price for this alone; the lips and clitorises of the star actresses are visible. The plot is tightly sewn, exploring the dangers of a man indulging in a threesome with his wife and the wife of another man. Shauna O'Brien and Beverly Lynne are very good actresses and this is the formers best film. The one drawback was the DVD print seemed faded, But this was a technical glitch which did not affect viewing pleasure.
